Nope, the spacing is still nonexistant. I think that the <P> 
(paragraph) tags will be better to use for that. BR just goes to the 
next line, and the text will still look scrunched up. Also, there's 
no </BR> tag.

And rAuq, you idea is brilliant! I'm gonna put in a quiz like that if 
you don't mind.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> Hey, rAuq, I fixed the rules page!  Ya!  I'm so great!  I'm the 
best!  Nobody can make pages better than me!!!  *gets slapped by 
conscience* Well......I did have a little help........*glares at 
rAuq, then turns away* I could've figured out the <br>~~~</br> 
myself!  BTW, Tron and Tiesel(I spelt that wrong) are still up for 
grabs, and Megaman hasn't been taken yet!
